text: Stanley Leigh (27 December 1901 - June 1986) was a British gymnast. He competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics and the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1986 deaths Category:British male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Swansea
title: Stanley Leigh
